verses.verse: My <S%G5040>little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> I am <S%G1125>writing<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> to you that you may not <S%G264>sin.<s%> And <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G264>sins,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> an <S%G3875>Advocate<s%> with the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous;<s%>

and He <S%G846>Himself<s%> is the <S%G2434>propitiation<s%> for our <S%G266>sins;<s%> and not for <S%G2251>ours<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> for [those of] the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world.<s%>
And by <S%G3778>this<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> that we have come to <S%G1097>know<s%> Him, <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G5083>keep<s%> His <S%G1785>commandments.<s%>
The one who <S%G3004>says,<s%> "I have come to <S%G1097>know<s%> Him," and does not <S%G5083>keep<s%> His <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> is a <S%G5583>liar,<s%> and the <S%G225>truth<s%> is not in him;

but <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G5083>keeps<s%> His <S%G3056>word,<s%> in him the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G230>truly<s%> been <S%G5048>perfected.<s%> By <S%G3778>this<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> that we are in Him:
the one who <S%G3004>says<s%> he <S%G3306>abides<s%> in Him <S%G3784>ought<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> to <S%G4043>walk<s%> in the <S%G3779>same<s%> <S%G3779>manner<s%> as He <S%G4043>walked.<s%>

<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> I am not <S%G1125>writing<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> to you, but an <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G2192>had<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning;<s%> the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> is the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G191>heard.<s%>

On the <S%G3825>other<s%> <S%G3825>hand,<s%> I am <S%G1125>writing<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> to you, <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G227>true<s%> in Him and in you, <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G4653>darkness<s%> is <S%G3855>passing<s%> <S%G3855>away,<s%> and the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> is <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G5316>shining.<s%>
The one who <S%G3004>says<s%> he is in the <S%G5457>light<s%> and [yet] <S%G3404>hates<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> is in the <S%G4653>darkness<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now.<s%>
The one who <S%G25>loves<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> in the <S%G5457>light<s%> and there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4625>cause<s%> for <S%G4625>stumbling<s%> in him.

But the one who <S%G3404>hates<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> is in the <S%G4653>darkness<s%> and <S%G4043>walks<s%> in the <S%G4653>darkness,<s%> and does not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> he is <S%G5217>going<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G4653>darkness<s%> has <S%G5186>blinded<s%> his <S%G3788>eyes.<s%>
I am <S%G1125>writing<s%> to you, <S%G5040>little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> your <S%G266>sins<s%> are <S%G863>forgiven<s%> you for His name's <S%G1223>sake.<s%>

I am <S%G1125>writing<s%> to you, <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G1097>know<s%> Him who has been from the <S%G746>beginning.<s%> I am <S%G1125>writing<s%> to you, <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>men,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G3528>overcome<s%> the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4190>one.<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> to you, <S%G3813>children,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

I have <S%G1125>written<s%> to you, <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G1097>know<s%> Him who has been from the <S%G746>beginning.<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> to you, <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>men,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you are <S%G2478>strong,<s%> and the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> in you, and you have <S%G3528>overcome<s%> the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4190>one.<s%>

Do not <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> the things in the <S%G2889>world.<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father<s%> is not in him.

For <S%G3956>all<s%> that is in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> the <S%G1939>lust<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and the <S%G1939>lust<s%> of the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> and the <S%G212>boastful<s%> <S%G212>pride<s%> of <S%G979>life,<s%> is not from the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> but is from the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

And the <S%G2889>world<s%> is <S%G3855>passing<s%> <S%G3855>away,<s%> and [also] its <S%G1939>lusts;<s%> but the one who <S%G4160>does<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%>

<S%G3813>Children,<s%> it is the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5610>hour;<s%> and <S%G2531>just<s%> as you <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G500>antichrist<s%> is <S%G2064>coming,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G500>antichrists<s%> have <S%G1096>arisen;<s%> from <S%G3606>this<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> that it is the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

They <S%G1831>went<s%> out from us, but they were not [really] of us; for <S%G1487>if<s%> they had <S%G1510>been<s%> of us, they would have <S%G3306>remained<s%> with us; but [they went out,] in <S%G2443>order<s%> that it might be <S%G5319>shown<s%> that they <S%G3956>all<s%> are not of us.
But you <S%G2192>have<s%> an <S%G5545>anointing<s%> from the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G40>One,<s%> and you <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3609>know.<s%>

I have not <S%G1125>written<s%> to you <S%G3754>because<s%> you do not <S%G3609>know<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> but <S%G3754>because<s%> you do <S%G3609>know<s%> it, and <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5579>lie<s%> is of the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

<S%G5101>Who<s%> is the <S%G5583>liar<s%> but the one who <S%G720>denies<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>? <S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G500>antichrist,<s%> the one who <S%G720>denies<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G5207>Son.<s%>

<S%G3956>Whoever<s%> <S%G720>denies<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> does not <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> the one who <S%G3670>confesses<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

As for you, let that <S%G3306>abide<s%> in you <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G191>heard<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning.<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G191>heard<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> in you, you <S%G2532>also<s%> will <S%G3306>abide<s%> in the <S%G5207>Son<s%> and in the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>
And <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G1861>made<s%> to us: <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> to you <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are trying to <S%G4105>deceive<s%> you.

And as for you, the <S%G5545>anointing<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2983>received<s%> from Him <S%G3306>abides<s%> in you, and you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> for <S%G5100>anyone<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> you; but as His <S%G5545>anointing<s%> <S%G1321>teaches<s%> you <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> and is <S%G227>true<s%> and is not a <S%G5579>lie,<s%> and <S%G2531>just<s%> as it has <S%G1321>taught<s%> you, you <S%G3306>abide<s%> in Him.

And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G5040>little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> in Him, <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G1437>when<s%> He <S%G5319>appears,<s%> we may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3954>confidence<s%> and not <S%G153>shrink<s%> <S%G575>away<s%> from Him in <S%G153>shame<s%> at His <S%G3952>coming.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> you <S%G3609>know<s%> that He is <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> you <S%G1097>know<s%> that <S%G3956>everyone<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> who <S%G4160>practices<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> is <S%G1080>born<s%> of Him.
